keyEvents.title: South Bird Hunt
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates venture deep into Jaya's dangerous jungle to hunt for the elusive South Bird, encountering various dangerous creatures.
keyEvents.significance: The forest serves as the setting for the crew's quest to obtain essential navigation assistance for their journey to Sky Island.

keyEvents.title: Robin Captures South Bird
keyEvents.description: Robin successfully captures the South Bird in the forest using her Hana Hana no Mi powers.
keyEvents.significance: The successful capture in this location enables the crew's eventual journey to Sky Island.

reveals.information: Home to dangerous creatures including giant mantises, ladybugs, slugs, and poisonous bees, as well as the South Bird

keyEvents.title: Bellamy Pirates Attack
keyEvents.description: Bellamy and his crew attack Cricket's residence to steal his salvaged gold, launching a surprise assault on the Saruyama Alliance.
keyEvents.significance: This location becomes the site of a major conflict between those who mock dreams and those who pursue them.

keyEvents.title: Saruyama Alliance Defeated
keyEvents.description: Cricket, Masira, and Shoujou are defeated by Bellamy at Cricket's house, unable to protect the gold Cricket spent ten years collecting.
keyEvents.significance: The defeat at their own home represents a violation of their sanctuary and their dreams.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Discover the Aftermath
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats return to Cricket's house to find their allies beaten and the gold stolen, with the Going Merry also vandalized.
keyEvents.significance: This discovery at Cricket's house motivates Luffy's decision to confront Bellamy.

reveals.information: Serves as the headquarters for the Saruyama Alliance and storage for Cricket's salvaged treasures

keyEvents.title: Bounty Posters Arrive at Bar
keyEvents.description: Jobo brings wanted posters to the Mock Town bar revealing Luffy's 100 million berry and Zoro's 60 million berry bounties, shocking Bellamy and the other patrons.
keyEvents.significance: The revelation in Mock Town creates dramatic tension as everyone realizes Bellamy severely underestimated the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Arrival
keyEvents.description: Luffy arrives at the Mock Town bar calling out for Bellamy, ready for their confrontation.
keyEvents.significance: Mock Town becomes the setting for the climactic showdown between Luffy and Bellamy.

reveals.information: The bar in Mock Town serves as a gathering place for pirates and a location where information spreads quickly
